img_summary: The image shows a wooden plate with a slightly raised rim, placed on a wooden stand. On the plate, there are several spherical objects, some of which are white and others are blue. The spheres appear to be smooth and are arranged in a pile. The background is dark, emphasizing the objects on the plate.
